item.title: Git
item.description: Git matters The seven rules of a great Git commit message source Separate subject from body with a blank line Limit the subject line to 50 characters Capitalize the subject line Do not end the subject line with a period Use the imperative mood in the subject line For example: If applied, this commit will refactor subsystem X for readability If applied, this commit will update getting started documentation If applied, this commit will remove deprecated methods If applied, this commit will release version 1.
